message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $14,500 feels fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,250?  This is a fair compromise that reflects the value you'll gain.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $12,750? I think this is a reasonable compromise that meets both of our needs.
